article_title: GOP congressional candidate Thomas calls for series of debates

article_metadata.description: A call for a series of debates heading into next August's primary election has stirred up sparks between the GOP contenders for the 2nd Congressional District seat on Capitol Hill.
article_metadata.author: ERYN DION
